name: Ever Growing - Make / Play
description:
Go through series of challenges, visit many colorful worlds and found out more about the maker of those worlds.

  • Large amount of stages
  • Ever expanding number of stages
  • Level editor (make your own stages and share them on official "Ever Growing" page)

GAME CONTENT:

Free version:

http://gamejolt.com/games/ever-growing-make-play/163607

  1. Game file (LEVEL EDITOR IS NOT INCLUDED)
  2. Game cover
  3. User manual.pdf
  4. Bonus book. pdf (sketches, level ideas, codes...)

Supporter version (here on itch.io):

  1. Game file (LEVEL EDITOR INCLUDED)
  2. Game cover
  3. User manual.pdf
  4. Bonus book. pdf (sketches, level ideas, codes...)

EVER GROWING OST:

https://scarletmoonrecords.bandcamp.com/album/ever-growing-official-soundtrack

OFFICIAL PAGE: https://ever-growinggame.blogspot.rs/p/about.html
